cu.explanation_en: Changed GNB_IPV4_ADDRESS_FOR_X2U from "192.168.70.135" to "10.0.0.1" to simulate unreachable routing definitions, causing IP range conflict and CU inability to reach X2U.

du.explanation_en: Changed remote_n_portd from 2152 to 0 to simulate out_of_range error, causing invalid port configuration and DU inability to communicate.
du.explanation_zh: 将 remote_n_portd 从 2152 更改为 0 以模拟 out_of_range 错误，导致无效的端口配置和 DU 无法通信。
